title: About Joshua
text: Joshua is a Frontend Developer focused on building simple, modern, and responsive web applications. His core skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js, with working knowledge of Node.js, Express, Supabase, and MongoDB. He specializes in creating clean user interfaces, intuitive user experiences, and scalable web solutions.

title: Services Joshua Can Provide
text: Joshua builds modern responsive websites, clean React user interfaces, admin dashboards, and simple full-stack applications. He works on API integrations, authentication features, CRUD systems, UI/UX improvements, debugging, performance optimization, and deployment to platforms such as Vercel. He also converts designs into functional web applications and improves existing systems.

title: Project: Chat Application
text: A modern messaging interface built with React featuring user lists, chat UI, component-based architecture, and efficient state management. The project demonstrates clean layout design, reusable components, and a scalable frontend structure.

title: Availability
text: Joshua is open to frontend developer roles and freelance projects focused on modern web applications. He works best with clear requirements, structured milestones, and regular communication.

title: Contact
text: You can contact Joshua through the website contact form, email, or WhatsApp for project inquiries and collaboration opportunities.
